law.catch_line: On application by the Commissioner, a court of competent jurisdiction may issue an injunction to res...
law.text:
On application by the Commissioner, a court of competent jurisdiction may issue an injunction to restrain a banking institution from:
An unsafe or unsound banking practice;
A practice that is injurious to the public interest; or
A violation of a law, rule, or regulation that relates to the Commissioner's supervision of the institution.
